resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>

  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE2120</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Practice of probability teaching: A comparative analysis of teaching probability in classes of different levels</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Praxis des Wahrscheinlichkeit Unterrichts: 
Eine Analyse mit Vergleichswerten der unterrichtenden 
Wahrscheinlichkeit in den Kategorien der unterschiedlichen Stufen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Pratique de l'enseignement de probabilité : 
Une analyse comparative de la probabilité d'enseignement dans 
les classes de différents niveaux</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Prática do ensino da probabilidade: Uma 
análise comparativa da probabilidade ensinando nas classes de níveis
diferentes</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Pratica di insegnamento di probabilità: 
Un'analisi comparativa della probabilità d'istruzione nei 
codici categoria dei livelli differenti</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πρακτική της διδασκαλίας πιθανότητας: Μια 
συγκριτική ανάλυση της πιθανότητας διδασκαλίας στις κλάσεις των 
διαφορετικών επιπέδων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Práctica de la enseñanza de la probabilidad: 
Un análisis comparativo de la probabilidad de enseñanza en las
clases de diversos niveles</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This research compares practices of teaching the topic of probability in high school classes of different levels but specifically for the Matriculation level.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">statistics</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">probability</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">teaching strategies</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Forschung vergleicht Praxis des 
Unterrichtens des Themas der Wahrscheinlichkeit in den High School 
Kategorien der unterschiedlichen Stufen aber spezifisch für die 
Matriculation Stufe.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette recherche compare des pratiques d'enseigner
le sujet de la probabilité dans des classes de lycée de différents 
niveaux mais spécifiquement pour le niveau d'Immatriculation.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta pesquisa compara práticas de ensinar o 
tópico da probabilidade em classes da High School de níveis 
diferentes mas especificamente para o nível de Matriculation.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa ricerca confronta le pratiche di 
istruzione del soggetto della probabilità nei codici categoria della 
High School dei livelli differenti ma specificamente per il livello di
Matriculation.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η έρευνα συγκρίνει τις πρακτικές της διδασκαλίας
του θέματος της πιθανότητας στις κλάσεις γυμνασίου των 
διαφορετικών επιπέδων αλλά συγκεκριμένα για το επίπεδο εγγραφής.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta investigación compara prácticas de 
enseñar el asunto de la probabilidad en las clases de la High School 
secundaria de diversos niveles pero específicamente para el nivel de 
Matriculation.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Statistiken</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wahrscheinlichkeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">unterrichtende Strategien</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">statistiques</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">probabilité</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">stratégies d'enseignement</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">statistics</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">probabilidade</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">estratégias ensinando</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">statistiche</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">probabilità</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">strategie d'istruzione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">στατιστικές</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">πιθανότητα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">estadística</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">probabilidad</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">estrategias de enseñanza</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
